MCP Server.MCPServerURLDescription: URL of the Docker MCP server (including port). Examples: http://localhost:4096 or http://192.168.1.100:4096
MCP Server.ApiKeyDescription: The API key must match the MCP_AUTH_TOKEN in the Docker .env file.
MCP Server.ActiveDescription: When enabled, the module periodically checks (every 60 seconds) the connection to the MCP server.
MCP Server.Disconnected: Not connected. Is the Docker container running? Is the URL correct?
MCP Server.ConnectionFailed: Connection failed. Check the MCP Server URL and whether the Docker container is running.
